title: Google\Cloud\Dlp\V2\CustomInfoType\DetectionRule\LikelihoodAdjustment
name: LikelihoodAdjustment
description:
Message for specifying an adjustment to the likelihood of a finding as part of a detection rule.

Generated from protobuf message google.privacy.dlp.v2.CustomInfoType.DetectionRule.LikelihoodAdjustment

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.fixed_likelihood
params.description: Set the likelihood of a finding to a fixed value.

params.name: data.relative_likelihood
params.description: Increase or decrease the likelihood by the specified number of levels. For example, if a finding would be POSSIBLE without the detection rule and relative_likelihood is 1, then it is upgraded to LIKELY, while a value of -1 would downgrade it to UNLIKELY. Likelihood may never drop below VERY_UNLIKELY or exceed VERY_LIKELY, so applying an adjustment of 1 followed by an adjustment of -1 when base likelihood is VERY_LIKELY will result in a final likelihood of LIKELY.

methods.name: getFixedLikelihood
methods.description:
Set the likelihood of a finding to a fixed value.

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.Likelihood fixed_likelihood = 1;

methods.name: setFixedLikelihood
methods.description:

Generated from protobuf field .google.privacy.dlp.v2.Likelihood fixed_likelihood = 1;

params.name: var
params.description: Set the likelihood of a finding to a fixed value.

methods.name: getRelativeLikelihood
methods.description:
Increase or decrease the likelihood by the specified number of levels. For example, if a finding would be POSSIBLE without the detection rule and relative_likelihood is 1, then it is upgraded to LIKELY, while a value of -1 would downgrade it to UNLIKELY.

Likelihood may never drop below VERY_UNLIKELY or exceed VERY_LIKELY, so applying an adjustment of 1 followed by an adjustment of -1 when base likelihood is VERY_LIKELY will result in a final likelihood of LIKELY.
